channel.title: Gestures on Laura Kalbag
channel.description: Recent content in Gestures on Laura Kalbag

item.title: Autodesk SketchBook Pro
item.description: I’ve always been a kind-of arty person. I took Art at school, did an Art Foundation and a Graphics degree. I totally loved art when I was small, but as I’ve got older, and more technology and web-obsessed, a lot of the old media went a bit out of the window. Though I was still loving wireframing and taking notes by hand, I just threw all the paints out in frustration at how slow and difficult they were.
